name: Tasty Roasted Pork Belly
description: This roasted pork belly will surprise you for sure! It’s a keto recipe you must try!
ingredients: 17 ounces apples, cored and cut into wedges
Salt and black pepper to the taste
directions: In your blender, mix water with apples, lemon juice and stevia and pulse very well.
Put the porkbelly in a steamer tray and steam for 1 hour.
Transfer pork belly to a baking sheet, rub with a drizzle of oil, season with salt and pepper and pour the apple sauce over it.
Slice pork roast, divide between plates and serve with the applesauce on top.

name: Amazing Stuffed Pork
description: Try this keto dish really soon!
Ingredients: Salt and black pepper to the taste
directions: In your food processor,mix lime zest and juice with orange zest and juice, garlic, oil, cilantro, mint, oregano, cumin, salt and pepper and blend well.
Season steaks with salt and pepper,place them into a bowl,add marinade you’ve made, toss to coat and leave aside for a couple of hours.
Place steaks on a working surface,divide pickles,cheese, mustard and ham on them, roll and secure with toothpicks.
Heat up a pan over medium high heat,add pork rolls cook them for 2 minutes on each side and transfer them to a baking sheet.
Introduce in the oven at 350 degrees F and bake for 25 minutes.

name: Delicious Pork Chops
description: These pork chops are all you need to end this day!
directions: Heat up a pan with the oil over medium heat,add mushrooms and onions, stir and cook for 4 minutes.
Add pork chops,season with nutmeg and garlic powder and brown on both sides.
Introduce pan in the oven at 350 degrees Fandbake for 30 minutes.
Transfer pork chops to plates and keep swarm.
Heat up the pan over medium heat,add vinegar and mayo over mushrooms mix, stir well and take off heat.
Drizzle sauce over pork chops and serve.
